title: Build full MOBIUS-NOVA investor & test site landing page with uploaded assets

requirements.text: Rebuild the LandingPage.tsx as a complete, fully-featured single-page site with the following sections in order: Hero, The Technology, Product Renders, Key Specs, Investor Pitch, Become a Test Site (sign-up form), and Contact/Get Involved. The page must use Deep Space Black (#0D0D0D) background, Liquid Silver (#C0C0C0), Nova Gold (#FFD700), and Cosmic Blue (#1E90FF) accents, Montserrat Bold all-caps headings throughout, and render correctly in production without crashing or blank-screen issues.

quotes: Attract investors and get some early test subjects and locations
Goals: Attract investors + recruit early test sites/partners

acceptanceCriteria: Page loads fully in both draft and live deployments without a blank screen
All seven sections are visible and scroll correctly
Brand colors, Montserrat font, and all-caps headings are consistently applied throughout

requirements.text: In the Hero section, display the MOBIUS-NOVA logo image (mobius-nova-logo.dim_1024x1024.png) prominently centered and enlarged. Below the logo show the tagline 'LIGHTING THE WAY TO THE FUTURE AND BEYOND' in Nova Gold. Add a Three.js / React Three Fiber animated liquid Möbius strip that renders as a looping 3D object with a flowing ripple/shimmer effect using Liquid Silver and Nova Gold metallic materials, placed as the hero's background or centerpiece behind the logo.

quotes: can we enlarge the logo some and is there a way to make the mobius loop look like it's liquid and has a moving flowing Ripple
Hero — Animated liquid Möbius strip (Three.js), logo, tagline

acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is larger than before and centered in the hero
Tagline appears below the logo in Nova Gold Montserrat Bold all-caps
A Three.js animated Möbius strip plays on loop with visible ripple/flow animation
Animation does not block interaction with CTA buttons

requirements.text: Create a 'THE TECHNOLOGY' section that displays the Frictionless Power Core Infographic image (frictionless-power-core.dim_900x1600.png) and the Engineering Analysis infographic image (engineering-analysis.dim_900x1600.png) side-by-side (stacked on mobile). Include a brief heading 'THE FRICTIONLESS POWER CORE' and a short description of the Universal Multi-Modal Core: single shaft supporting interchangeable VAWT wind, Gorlov hydro, and wave rectifier configurations, with Halbach magnetic levitation frictionless bearing system.

quotes: Technology section with Frictionless Power Core overview and engineering infographic images
The Technology — Frictionless Power Core overview with your infographic and engineering analysis images

acceptanceCriteria: Both infographic images are displayed clearly at full readable size
Section heading uses Montserrat Bold all-caps brand styling
Layout is responsive: two columns on desktop, single column on mobile

requirements.text: Create a 'DEPLOYMENTS IN ACTION' product renders section showcasing four environment cards, each with the corresponding uploaded image and a label: (1) Off-Grid Mountain Cabin (offgrid.png → offgrid-render.dim_1200x800.png), (2) Rural Farm Deck (farm-render.dim_1200x800.png), (3) Mars Colony (mars-render.dim_1200x800.png), (4) CAD Engineering Detail (cad-detail.dim_1200x800.png). Each card should show the image, environment name, and a one-line deployment description.

quotes: Product Renders — Spiral turbine deployments (off-grid cabin, farm, Mars colony renders)
Product renders section showcasing spiral turbine deployments in multiple environments

acceptanceCriteria: All four render images are displayed in a responsive grid (2x2 on desktop, 1-column on mobile)
Each card includes the environment name and deployment description in brand typography
Images load correctly from the static assets folder

requirements.text: Create a 'KEY SPECIFICATIONS' section displaying the following specs as a styled stat grid with Nova Gold numbers and Liquid Silver labels: Power Output (4.5–8.0 kW), Turbine Height (1.83 m), Blade Diameter (1.52 m), Primary Helix Angle (270°), Stator Count (4 Stacked Units), Bearing System (Frictionless Halbach Magnetic Levitation), Energy Modes (Wind / Hydro / Wave). Use large bold Nova Gold numerals for the values.

quotes: Key Specs — Power output (4.5–8kW), multi-modal adaptability, frictionless bearing system

acceptanceCriteria: All seven specification items are displayed
Nova Gold is used for numeric values and Liquid Silver for labels
Section is responsive and readable on mobile

requirements.text: Create an 'INVESTOR OPPORTUNITY' section with a compelling pitch covering: market opportunity in distributed renewable energy, early-stage investment advantages, the technology's differentiation (multi-modal single core, frictionless operation, 4.5–8kW realistic output, 5–15 year ROI grid-tie), and a prominent call-to-action button labeled 'REQUEST INVESTOR DECK' that opens a mailto link or scrolls to the contact form. Style with a Nova Gold border/accent card on Deep Space Black.

quotes: Investor Pitch — Why invest, market opportunity, early-stage advantages

acceptanceCriteria: Section contains at least three investor value points
'REQUEST INVESTOR DECK' CTA button is prominent and functional
Section uses Nova Gold accent styling consistent with brand

requirements.text: Create a 'BECOME A TEST SITE' section with a sign-up form for early adopters and location partners. The form must collect: Full Name, Email Address, Phone Number (optional), Location/Address, Property Type (dropdown: Residential, Farm/Agricultural, Commercial, Industrial, Remote/Off-Grid, Other), Available Energy Sources at Site (checkboxes: Wind, Water/Stream, Both), and a Message/Notes field. Include a Nova Gold submit button labeled 'APPLY AS TEST SITE'. On submission, store the entry in the Motoko backend and show a success confirmation message.

quotes: Become a Test Site — Call-to-action form for early adopters and location partners
get some early test subjects and locations

acceptanceCriteria: Form renders with all listed fields
Dropdown and checkboxes function correctly
Submission saves data to the backend canister
Success confirmation is shown after successful submit
Form validates that Name, Email, and Location are not empty before submitting

requirements.text: Create a 'GET INVOLVED' contact section with two sub-forms side by side (stacked on mobile): (1) Investor Inquiry — fields for Name, Email, Company, Investment Range (dropdown: Under $10K, $10K–$50K, $50K–$250K, $250K+), Message, and a 'SEND INQUIRY' button; (2) General Partnership — fields for Name, Email, Organization, Partnership Type (dropdown: Technology, Distribution, Research, Media, Other), and Message, with a 'SEND MESSAGE' button. Store submissions in the Motoko backend. Show success confirmations per form.

quotes: Contact / Get Involved — Investor inquiry and partnership contact forms

acceptanceCriteria: Both sub-forms render with correct fields
Each form submits independently and stores data in the backend
Success confirmations display after each submission
Name and Email are required fields validated before submission

requirements.text: Implement Motoko backend functions to store and retrieve test site applications (from REQ-7) and contact/investor inquiries (from REQ-8). Define stable data structures for: TestSiteApplication (name, email, phone, location, propertyType, energySources, message, timestamp) and ContactInquiry (name, email, company, inquiryType, message, timestamp). Expose public update functions: submitTestSiteApplication, submitInvestorInquiry, submitPartnershipInquiry, and query functions: getTestSiteApplications, getInquiries (for admin review).

quotes: Become a Test Site — Call-to-action form
Contact / Get Involved — Investor inquiry and partnership contact forms

acceptanceCriteria: All four update functions accept correctly typed arguments and persist data in stable variables
Query functions return stored records
Backend compiles without errors in Motoko

requirements.text: Render all uploaded product and infographic images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated. Update the existing HeroSection and LandingPage to reference these asset paths. Ensure the MOBIUS-NOVA logo (mobius-nova-logo.dim_1024x1024.png) is used in the hero and navbar/footer.

quotes: The first picture is the logo and tagline the rest are renders made by our cad files

acceptanceCriteria: All images load from /assets/generated/ without 404 errors
Logo appears in hero section at enlarged size
Product render images appear in the Deployments section
Infographic images appear in the Technology section

constraints: All brand text headings must be ALL-CAPS using Montserrat Bold
Color palette must strictly use: Deep Space Black (#0D0D0D), Liquid Silver (#C0C0C0), Nova Gold (#FFD700), Cosmic Blue (#1E90FF), Solar White (#FFFFFF)
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
The live deployment must be stable — avoid patterns that caused previous blank-screen issues (e.g., unguarded Three.js imports, missing null checks)
nonGoals: Admin dashboard UI for viewing form submissions (backend query functions are sufficient for now)
Multi-page routing changes beyond the existing route structure

required: MOBIUS-NOVA logo: liquid silver Möbius strip with golden rose at center, golden animal figure, cosmic checkerboard background, company name MOBIUS-NOVA ENERGY in silver all-caps, tagline in Nova Gold below (mobius-nova-logo.dim_1024x1024.png)
